title: Vintage Rolex Submariner (1970)
description: A classic 1970s Rolex Submariner. Excellent working condition with minor cosmetic wear consistent with age. Original box included.

title: Signed Lionel Messi Jersey (2022 World Cup)
description: Authentic, match-issued (but not match-worn) Argentina jersey, personally signed by Lionel Messi after the 2022 World Cup victory. Certificate of Authenticity (COA) provided.

title: Antique Persian Rug (Tabriz)
description: Hand-knotted Tabriz rug, approximately 9ft x 12ft. Intricate floral design in excellent condition. Estimated age: 80-100 years.

title: First Edition: The Hobbit
description: The first edition, first printing of J.R.R. Tolkien's 'The Hobbit'. Published in 1937. Extremely rare, cover shows expected wear.

title: Samsung QN90C 65-inch Neo QLED 4K Smart TV (Sealed)
description: Brand new, sealed in box. Latest model QLED TV with 4K resolution and smart features. Full manufacturer warranty included.

title: Set of 4 Michelin Defender T+H Tires
description: Four brand new all-season tires. Size P215/60R16. Never mounted. Perfect for sedan or small SUV vehicles.
